meanings.definition: Covered or paved with small, rounded stones (pebbles).
meanings.sent1: The pebbled path glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The driveway was pebbled, making it easy to walk on.
meanings.sent3: The pebbled ground looked like a giant mosaic.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as pebbled as the path to happiness.
meanings.sent5: The pebbled surface felt cool under his feet.

meanings.definition: Having a texture or appearance resembling pebbles.
meanings.sent1: The pebbled fabric felt rough against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The pebbled wallpaper added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The pebbled texture of the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as pebbled as the gravel road.
meanings.sent5: The pebbled appearance of the wall gave it a rustic charm.
